attributes.additional_details: I want the government to stop pharmacuetical compainies adding products to their medications that cause weight gain, I have a list of fibromyalgia patients and endometriosis patients who have put on weight because cetain types of medications make you more hungary and therefore you eat more, or like in my case have been susceptible to the weight gain side effects, in endometriosis women also suffer alot of swelling which can make us look pregnant, if the NHS wants to stop the obese putting on the healthcare system then STOP making medications that cause weigh gain.
